content.data: Enduring the anguish of wounds, they began to inflict wounds and cut the good steel-armours in the battlefield, the ghosts and the vultures moved in the sky and the vampires shrieked vultures moved in the sky and the vampires shrieked violently.493.
ਡਾਕਣੀਆਂ ਉੱਚੀ ਸੁਰ ਵਿਚ ਕਿਲਕਾਰੀਆਂ ਮਾਰ ਰਹੀਆਂ ਹਨ ॥੪੯੩॥
